name: Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">

$(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleString());
    }

    if(document.clockInterval){ 
            clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
            document.clockInterval = null;
    }
        
    document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
}

</script>

name: scan
parseOptions
parseInfo
func:
var ip = msg.payload.match(/inet ([0-9\.]+)/)[1]
var mask = msg.payload.match(/netmask ([0-9\.]+)/)[1]
var broadcast = msg.payload.match(/broadcast ([0-9\.]+)/)[1]


node.send({topic: 'ip', payload: ip})
node.send({topic: 'mask', payload: mask})
node.send({topic: 'broadcast', payload: broadcast})

msg.payload = {ssid: msg.payload}

return msg;

name: getPassphrase
func:
var data = msg.payload

var command = `wpa_passphrase "${data.ssid}" "${data.password}" | sed '/#psk=".*"/d'`
 
msg.payload = command

return msg

name: updateWpasupplicant
func:
var template = `sudo tee /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf <<EOF
ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev
update_config=1
country=IT

${msg.payload}
EOF\n
`

msg.payload = template

return msg;

name: showMessage
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.trim() === 'OK' ? "Wifi configuration updated successfully" : "Error while updating wifi configuration"

return msg;

name: parseInfo
func:
var ssid = msg.payload.match(/ESSID:"([^"]+)"/)[1]


node.send({topic: 'ssid', payload: ssid})
